channel.title: Drones on Cloud Native Development
channel.description: Recent content in Drones on Cloud Native Development

item.title: Drone
item.description: Drone CI Server and Agent configuration Location: https://drone.kubernetes.lol/ Official documentation can be found at docs.drone.io. This includes Plugin, CLI, and API references The following variables must be set for this to run correctly: CLI use DRONE_SERVER=https://drone.kubernetes.lol/ DRONE_TOKEN=<found in drone server settings> Hosted DRONE_GITHUB=true DRONE_GITHUB_URL=https://github.com DRONE_GITHUB_CLIENT=<github oatuh> DRONE_GITHUB_SECRET=<github oatuh> DRONE_GITHUB_SCOPE=repo,repo:status,user:email,read:org DRONE_SECRET=<string> Using the CLI One of Drones features the differentiate it from other CI services is its CLI client.
